scheme_name: Outstanding Artisan of the Year under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises”
details: The award is conferred upon the artisan who has been a participant for 3 years in National / International handicraft exhibitions/fairs. The awardee is given a cash award of ₹2,00,000/- and a citation. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form available on the Official Website of the Department.
benefits: Cash Award of ₹2,00,000/- and a Citation.
eligibility: The applicant should be an Artisan.
The applicant should have been a participant for 3 years in National / International handicraft exhibitions/fairs.
application_process: The Director of Industries will invite the application for award by wide publicity.
The artisan should apply for the award in the prescribed form available on the Official Website of the Directorate of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry.
In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required).
The artisan should submit the duly filled and signed application form and the documents to the concerned authority either in person or by post.
The applications shall be scrutinised by the Directorate of Industries and Commerce on a merit basis for the grant of state awards will be placed before the award Committee.
The Committee for the awards will go into the merits of each case for granting the award.
The list of selected artisans shall be notified and informed by the Director of Industries to the enterprises to receive the awards.
documents_required: Proof of participation in National / International handicraft exhibitions/fairs.
Any other document, as required by the Award Committee.
